## TransactableMoneyp.borrowBPD() method

Adjust existing Vault by borrowing more BPD.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
borrowBPD(amount: Decimalish, maxBorrowingRate?: Decimalish): Promise<VaultAdjustmentDetails>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of BPD to borrow. |
|  maxBorrowingRate | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Maximum acceptable [borrowing rate](./lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md)<!-- -->. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[VaultAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.vaultadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./lib-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustVault({ borrowBPD: amount }, maxBorrowingRate)

```
